networks.Bus.Bus¶

class networks.Bus.Bus(name, vn_kv, type, zone, max_vm_pu, min_vm_pu, in_service)¶

Bases: Element

A class representing a bus in a power system network.

Parameters:

  • name (str) – The name of the bus.

  • vn_kv (float) – The voltage magnitude of the bus in kV.

  • type (str) – The type of the bus.

  • zone (str) – The zone to which the bus belongs.

  • max_vm_pu (float) – The maximum voltage magnitude of the bus in per unit.

  • min_vm_pu (float) – The minimum voltage magnitude of the bus in per unit.

  • in_service (bool) – Whether the bus is in service or not.

__init__(name, vn_kv, type, zone, max_vm_pu, min_vm_pu, in_service)¶

Initializes a Bus object.

Parameters:

  • name (str) – The name of the bus.

  • vn_kv (float) – The voltage magnitude of the bus in kV.

  • type (str) – The type of the bus.

  • zone (str) – The zone to which the bus belongs.

  • max_vm_pu (float) – The maximum voltage magnitude of the bus in per unit.

  • min_vm_pu (float) – The minimum voltage magnitude of the bus in per unit.

  • in_service (bool) – Whether the bus is in service or not.
